name: Maliss in the Mirror
text: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish 1 "Maliss" monster from your hand or face-up field, and if you do, negate that monster's effects until the end of this turn. If this card is banished: You can target 1 "Maliss" card in your GY; banish it, and if you do, add 1 "Maliss" card of the same type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Maliss in the Mirror" once per turn.
